name: check-cod
title: Call of Duty (COD)
description: Memeriksa dan mengambil nama/nickname pemain Call of Duty (COD) berdasarkan Open ID.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.label: Open ID COD
parameters.placeholder: Masukkan Open ID Call of Duty Anda

curl:
curl -X POST https://bovalone.me/api/check-cod \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"user_id":"MASUKKAN_OPEN_ID"}'
